data.name: Linelight
data.description:
**** 2.0 UPDATE: Passthrough and Hands! ****
Play Linelight in the real world with Passthrough, and control the game with your Hands! You can now enjoy Linelight in MR, and without controllers. It's pretty sweet!

Linelight is a relaxing, wholesome puzzle game with a big heart. Picture getting a back massage while grooving to chill electronic beats, solving clever, award-winning puzzles, always ready to discover what surprises wait around the corner.

PLAY LAYING DOWN
Finally, a VR game you can play horizontally! You can optionally play laying down comfortably with the game above you. This is about as relaxing as technology gets.

YA GONNA FEEL SMART
You are going to feel smart.

YOU CAN DO EET
The only control is to move. So whether this is your first game or your thousandth, you can pick it up in just a few seconds.

MUCH CONTENT
There are over 6 worlds chock-filled with ingenious puzzles and surprises, with a total of 6-8 hours of delightful content.

QUOTES
“Finding a game like Linelight feels like a blessing.” - GameSpot
“Bursting with design smarts… For a chilled puzzling time, they don’t get much better than this.” - Rock Paper Shotgun
“Pure, unadulterated gameplay.” - Polygon
“Linelight is nothing short of a stroke of genius.” - Hardcore Gamer
“A crowning achievement in the puzzle genre… An unforgettably unique gaming experience.” - OPNoobs (9/10)
“Ingenious… The amount of times I said to myself ‘Ooh, that’s clever!’ was too numerous to count.” - God is a Geek (9/10)
